title: Disney says Florida would have to pay nearly $1 billion to dissolve special district - NPR
content:
1. Disney says Florida would have to pay nearly $1 billion to dissolve special district  NPR
  2. Disney says Florida can’t dissolve special tax district until debt is fully paid  Fox Business
  3. Disney says Florida can't dissolve district without paying $1 billion bond debt  WPTV News - FL Palm Beaches and Treasure Coast
  4. Spineless Florida lawmakers rushed to aid a vengeful DeSantis — and made a mess of it | Editorial  Miami Herald
  5. Editorial: Florida's shame and the war on Disney  Palm Beach Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Walt Disney World complex's governing board says that when Florida created its special district, the state pledged not to alter that status unless all its debts are paid off.
